item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (216 points | 49 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (235 points | 157 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (188 points | 61 comments)
4. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (209 points | 174 comments)
5. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (199 points | 27 comments)
6. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (431 points | 114 comments)
7. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (24 points | 1 comment)
8. Supreme Court allows multibillion-dollar class action to proceed against Meta (69 points | 25 comments)
9. Rust's Two Kinds of 'Assert' Make for Better Code (33 points | 34 comments)
10. 32k context length text embedding models (46 points | 15 comments)
11. Foursquare's 104M Points of Interest (31 points | 8 comments)
12. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (56 points | discuss)
13. Minecraft enters real world with $110M global theme park deal (10 points | 2 comments)
14. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (41 points | 13 comments)
15. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (54 points | 18 comments)
16. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (17 points | 1 comment)
17. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (94 points | 30 comments)
18. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (97 points | 41 comments)
19. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (85 points | 3 comments)
20. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (43 points | 3 comments)
21. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (166 points | 23 comments)
22. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (33 points | 2 comments)
23. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (58 points | 17 comments)
24. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (293 points | 65 comments)
25. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (145 points | 34 comments)
26. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (51 points | 10 comments)
27. Developing nations blast $300B COP29 climate deal as insufficient (33 points | 29 comments)
28. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (50 points | 6 comments)
29. Hundreds More Nazca Lines Emerge in Peru's Desert (18 points | 13 comments)
30. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (31 points | 2 comments)
